paragraphs.text:
val keySpace = "cass_db"
val table = "student_price"

val fullTable = sqlContext.read.format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra").options(Map("keyspace" -> keySpace, "table" -> table)).load()
fullTable.createOrReplaceTempView(table)
